website_summaries.verdict: Quiet and aesthetically adapts to most design concepts.
pros: Features 6 vertical settings and three speed settings
We love the airflow and this fan's portability
Can sit on a dresser and cool a whole room quickly
cons: May rattle a bit here and there

customer_reviews.title: Works fine after removing plastic from the inside
customer_reviews.text: Received this fan today. When I turned it on, it instantly started rattling, like something was in it. So I took it apart and found 2 little plastic bits probably left on by the assembly people. There is no way this was quality tested before it was sent out. I removed and sanded the plastic bits and put it back together and it works fine now. I think they need to work on their quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Smith

customer_reviews.title: The switch is a nice touch. Maybe it could put out a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Been running this on high about 7 hours a day as an exhaust out my window for the past several months. It's very quiet. The switch is a nice touch. Maybe it could put out a little more air on the first two speeds but on high it is definitely good for my needs. The preset tilt positions lock well and it will stay in place between clicks as well.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: A quiet medium sized fan
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet for a small-medium sized fan which is what I was looking for. Good for about a 10x15 room.
customer_reviews.author: David in Albuquerque

customer_reviews.title: Tilts DOWN from above!
customer_reviews.text: This fan tilts down from above which many do not. Good for high places! Pretty quiet, two other brands got returned due to being too loud for watching TV. Good value. Wanted remote control but didn’t want to spend $60. Using a remote control outlet instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We bought two of these... one works kind of??? Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: The first one function okay. The second one seems to be underpowered or defective. The low setting on the functional fan is about the same as the high setting on the dysfunctional fan. No good. Don’t risk it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Forget the Vornado!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried out a LARGE variety of fans both for living space and to run while sleeping and this fan rates really high. It has the perfect level of white noise that fades in the background and it also has great options for positioning and oscillating as well. I sit it on top of my dresser and it allows for perfect airflow when on low and higher when it is warmer at night. I have more expensive fans that don't work as well and are much louder. Completely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nowak

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this fan
customer_reviews.text: Because I deal with surgically induced menopause I overheat at night- A LOT. Even in winter I keep my bedroom cold. My old fan finally died so I needed a replacement for my bedside. This is the best bedside fan I've ever had. The noise level could be better, but it's still not terrible, and because the control is on the front and can be turned 360degrees to turn the fan on, up, down, or off- I can adjust it even in the middle of the night without looking. Puts out a really decent amount of air even on low, and keeps cool air circulating really really well. . Will DEFINITELY buy another if we ever need another tabletop/desktop fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good white noise fan
customer_reviews.text: Overall I acknowledge that this is a really great fan. I don’t know who wouldn't be happy with it. But for my specific reason, I was looking for a replacement for the Vornado fan I had the blew out after 5 years, and I used the noise to sleep with. This fan is way too quiet for me but I know that for others it would be the ideal white noise so I’m not sure. Overall I’m not very pleased with this and if you enjoy a louder sound for sleeping I would not recommend it. However as for its use as a cooling fan it definitely works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a desk fan for my cube at work
customer_reviews.text: Searched several fans and am very happy I chose this one. It is very quiet, especially on low and the power of the breeze is perfect!! It is a bit bulky for the desk. I may buy another for at home. Very well made!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy M

customer_reviews.title: Bought August 15th its now September 21st and it already stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Not even over a month it is already not working properly. Fan never moves and just stopped working I have to shake it to make it start working. Not worth 26 bucks piece of junk. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana Brock

customer_reviews.title: Weak fan.
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the great reviews, I decided to save some money and buy this fan, instead of the more expensive brand I've bought before. But when I turned it on, next to that other one, I learned it's MUCH weaker, it blows, at MOST half as much air. Returning it. If you want a powerful fan, don't buy this one. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: ekaje

customer_reviews.title: Weak fans, low output
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of these instead of Vornados, to save money. You get what you pay for. There are 3 settings, the highest is like low on a Vornado, the settings aren't marked so you go by feel, spinning the knob 360 degrees, junk. One already died.
customer_reviews.author: Randolph V. Rome Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great fan at great price
customer_reviews.text: This fan is perfect for helping keep our living room bearable during the hotter months here in California. The oscillation helps ensure a sufficient airflow in the living room and I have had it running since it arrived without any issues at all. The compact size makes me very happy, no more giant box fans taking up floor space. I have since purchased 2 additional models of the Woozoo fans for my bedroom and I definitely recommend this fan to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: CaliGal66

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed ☹️ Did not last.
customer_reviews.text: Does manufacturer honor No Hassle warranty of 1 year? Well, to be determined as I sent message through corporate chat site Stating our fan used exclusively for indoor master bedroom from Purchase month August 2019 until November 2019 then stored for winter attempted reuse April 2020 and failed to run, will warranty replace it,? and response was, “expect to hear from us shortly via email.” It’s been 7 days and no response thus far. Disappointed ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Siebels

customer_reviews.title: LOW POWERED FAN
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this fan is extremely quiet. But so is any fan that is on it's lowest setting and this fan's highest setting is not even as strong as my old fan's lowest setting. There is so power behind this fan. I noticed that it's called a " Circulator Fan." I should have guessed that meant it does not blow very hard. It barely moves air around my room...but it does and yes, it's quiet. But I didn't buy a fan to be quiet. I bought a fan to blow air. This just doesn't cut it. Thinking of returning it for my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Giles

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this fan.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this fan. I expected much more for the price but does not put out much air. Almost like a desk fan, certainly not a whole room fan. Should have bought the honeywell for $13 at wall mart instead of this one but I thought this would be better for the price. It is very quiet and lightweight (all plastic). but you can barely feel the air output.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph N.

customer_reviews.title: I’m a fan of this fan
customer_reviews.text: This is an affordable and surprisingly effective compact fan. Right now I have it sitting on a side table in my bedroom and on medium speed I can feel the breeze from across the room. It’s also pretty quiet so I have no problems leaving it on during my Zoom calls while working from home. I only regret not buying the oscillating version which costs a few extra bucks. So just make sure you’re fine occasionally getting up to reposition the fan or be OK with a constant (but cooling) stream of air hitting your face.
customer_reviews.author: edo408

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and no annoying lights when you sleep!
customer_reviews.text: If you like it quiet and dark this is the right fan for you! I love to sleep with a fan but I hate light from buttons on products. This fan is small and doesn’t overtake my nightstand, moves the air better than my old 12inch fan that broke and is SUPER quiet. I like the white noise and on Low it’s perfect. It’s ok on the higher speeds too but I don’t need it colder or louder. As long as it doesn’t start developing a tick this will be my favorite fan ever!
customer_reviews.author: becky nelson

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend this fan! Its a breath of fresh air!:)
customer_reviews.text: I just received the oscillating fan. It is fully assembled, unboxes very easy. lightweight too. I am very happy with it. I am surprised how such a small fan is so powerful. It helps to cool and circulate air in the entire room, which is average size. It also enhances ac cooling. so worth the purchase. the price is good too. Will definitely order a second fan for the living room. Very satisfied customer! Also thank goodness for Amazon! Best company ever!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Weber

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this fan
customer_reviews.text: I use this fan in my office so the size is perfect and I like that the controls are on the front and easy to use. Most of the time, the low setting is just right and so quiet I forget it's on. The direction of the air can be controlled which means it's not blowing right in my eyes. The fan I replaced (put in m utility room) had the controls in the back and was very noisy although it was supposed to be quiet. I plan to purchase more fans of this brand for other rooms to be able to run my A/C at a higher temp and save money.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Skies

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this fan for work since we have a room that gets hot quickly and its perfect! I liked it so much I purchased another one for my home! The noise level to me is nice, i like background noise especially when I'm going to bed and this is perfect. Durability id say it's great, left for work with it on a desk and it somehow fell off to the ground during the day, still works perfectly, nothing broken, nothing clattering around and still runs smooth. Highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Trish C

customer_reviews.title: Best I've had. Not noisy, but still moves air.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully quiet. Able to listen to music or TV when it's on. Good air flow from 10 -15 feet away. Recommending to friends and family since we don't have air conditioning here in government ,senior housing.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: My kitchen gets hot when I'm cooking, especially in the summer. That's why I bought this little fan... help circulate the air and cool down my galley-style kitchen so I can stay in there stirring and not burn the dinner. It works perfectly for my needs. Its relatively quiet, lightweight, easy to use, and does what I tell it to when I tell it... unlike, say, a teenager and a messy room.... but that's another story for another day.
customer_reviews.author: Bibliophile

customer_reviews.title: Love love love ❤️
customer_reviews.text: This fan is perfect. It fits perfectly on my wall shelf above my bed. I love the way it looks and the fact that its an oscillating is perfect for my pup that love to sit in front of the window but gets hot after awhile. 💕 The setting vary nicely. The lowest setting is a very soft blowing (which I prefer) almost like a light breeze. And the strongest is strong enough without being really loud. The noise is very soft and soothing (if you enjoy the sound of fans).
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: NOT Made In USA!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this fan mainly because it was made in the USA. It is not! Printed in big letters on both the outer box and inner box: Made In China. Didn't even take it out of the box. Sent it back!
customer_reviews.author: PomMom

customer_reviews.title: this guy is not your best bet. For the price though
customer_reviews.text: This fan has 3 settings: Low, Medium, High. The low setting is very quiet. I could barely hear any noise. I purchased this fan for white noise, as my previous Honeywell fan clonked out fairly early into its existence. If you are looking for white noise, this fan will do the job on medium and high. These settings also produce the most air circulation. If you are really looking for some noise though, this guy is not your best bet. For the price though, it fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas R.

customer_reviews.title: Really Quiet / Good Airflow
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how quiet it was and it still moves lots of air. Speed 1 is almost silent, speed 2 is barely noticable in a room with no other noise sources and really can’t be heard if a TV is on. Speed 3 moves a ton of air (for a fan this size) and still not that loud. Sturdy and nice looking too.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S.

customer_reviews.title: handy quiet fan - and looks OK
customer_reviews.text: DOes what it's supposed to do - provide moderate air circulation. Just a breeze, not a storm. Not absolutely quiet but hardly noticeable at the low setting. We use it to circulate air n the bedroom at night. It's perfect for that. My only gripe is that the on/off/hi/low knob is hard to turn. It should have had a tab that your finger can push against. It's just smooth round. Solution: put a mini radiator hose clamp around it and then it's easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Ksenia

customer_reviews.title: GREAT little fan!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned upon opening the box as I had thought this fan would be larger, but it's everything I wanted just as it is: excellent air output and so quiet on the low setting that I have to put my hand in front of it to check that it's on (it's exhausting air out for now). Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. West

customer_reviews.title: The whole room is breezy
customer_reviews.text: We have a fan in both upstairs bedrooms and they work great. VERY QUIET and they really churn the air appropriately. My son uses ossicillating and after a few weeks it started to squeak, but he is going to figure out where to oil it. I use mine pointing up with a steady flow. Keeps my hot flashes at bay and I am a light sleeper, so I adore that it is very quiet. Very happy with this purchase as opposed to the tower fan we had.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: WOW.
customer_reviews.text: this is actually the best fan I've ever bought. It doesn't have an annoying sound (it's actually very nice), its made with good material, you can rotate it easily, it's very powerful, it's not an ugly fan AND for the price...this is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Lily J

customer_reviews.title: Like the oscillating feature. Moves enough air.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t move as much air as the brand that starts wit a V of a similar style, But this one oscillates & that makes up for it. It’s also a lot quieter. So far it’s working well, I hope it lasts longer then the air movers which only ever last a year.
customer_reviews.author: JanCor

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price.
customer_reviews.text: If you like white fan type noise while sleeping, this is an excellent choice. Puts out enough air to keep cool at night. I have purchased several small fans that wobble and create rattling sounds. This one is the best yet!
customer_reviews.author: Happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Decent fan at a good price
customer_reviews.text: This fan was purchased to replace a Honeywell that I have had for years. It is much quieter, and has a reasonable amount of air flow for the size. It's not going to blow you away, but it will provide small room air circulation. It is quiet enough to be used on an end table and still watch TV without having to crank up the TV to deafening levels. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M

customer_reviews.title: it moves plenty of air to provide a comfortable breeze. And the little bugger is build like ...
customer_reviews.text: First impressions upon receipt: It's kinda small, I hope it moves a reasonable amount of air, ad Gosh, it's surprisingly heavy for is size. After using it for a week or so, I can confirm these impressions in a positive way. Keeping in mind the fact that this is a desk fan (i.e., not intended to blow air around a room but directly on you), it moves plenty of air to provide a comfortable breeze. And the little bugger is build like a tank -- very sturdy.. Also it's surprisingly quiet, if that is important to you. And reasonably priced for the quality you're getting. I am very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Arbuthnot

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My son had me order this to use in his gaming room. His computer makes the room warm, so he placed it right next to him. It's a little noisy but not bad. We couldn't get it to stay in one position, so we did have to rig it a little bit. The power and price of this fan makes it completely worth it! My son said he's never hot anymore and he actually has to turn it DOWN.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Good Fan, Hard to Clean?
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Mine isn't the quietest, but then that helps me sleep. What I'm unclear on is how to open it so I can dust it off (sat there during the winter cold). There are tabs on the back that won't move. I didn't get instructions with mine, so I didn't know there was more to getting the cover off than a twist or a couple hinges (like other cheap fans I've had). Anyway, good price, doesn't oscillate but you can set angled up or down at pretty good angles.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Love this little fan. I got for the bathroom. My son takes loooong showers and the moisture is literally dripping down the walls. The exhaust fan doesn’t work well. To stave off mildew I got this fan. It fits well on the back of the toilet. I can tilt it up or down. I usually leave it on oscillating but there’s an option to leave in one direction. Reasonably quiet but really good power on higher speeds. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: N. Reardon

customer_reviews.title: This is not a quiet fan
customer_reviews.text: This is not a quiet fan, and it is not quiet on low setting. This small fan’s whirling noise is louder than my bigger fan. You cannot hear TV with fan on medium and high 10 feet away. The fan is not assembled well and the loose parts make ticking noises. I would not recommend this fan, especially people looking for a quiet fan.
customer_reviews.author: Young K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Fan!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many fans for my nightstand to help with hot flashes/night sweats. This is the best! All the other fans mostly disbursed air to the sides, very little air was disbursed straight/forward. This one does! Yes, high speed is a little loud for sleeping, but I have not had the need to use this speed. I am good with low and medium speeds as the air output for these speeds are awesome! I highly recommend this fan! You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MaryMumMum

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fan for bedside use
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for bedside use after bad experiences with quality of many similar fans. Liked it so much that I promptly bought 2 more as spares. Quiet, reasonable air flow for intended use, decent price. Have run it 24x7 for the last month. Can’t predict lifetime but so far I am 100% happy. My model does not oscillate, but for my purposes that is one less potential cause of failure and noise. Simple, reliable click adjustment of vertical angle. Others have mentioned quality control concerns but mine works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Doug H

customer_reviews.title: Woozoo HD18NU Basic Fan
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the basic fan that does not oscillate. The fan has good airflow and is reasonably quiet for the size. The power cord is ungrounded (2-wire). There is a pivot to set elevation, though that is in coarse increments. The fan has three speeds, but the control is bidirectional and requires more force than a switch should.
customer_reviews.author: EB-58

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan...Good Price.
customer_reviews.text: Great little fan. This is the second of these I’ve purchased, so this review is primarily based on the first unit. It has been and continues to run 24 hours a day and has been doing so for almost two years. On “Low” speed, it is virtually silent, but at the same time moves a significant volume of air. I keep it pointed at my Lazy Boy, so my wife—-who gets cold easily—-can keep the thermostat at a higher level then that which I’m comfortable with. The second fan was purchased because I was so impressed with the first.
customer_reviews.author: Harold H.

customer_reviews.title: Power
customer_reviews.text: What a great little fan. Fairly quiet and very powerful for its size. I bought a second one after I bought my first one. I use it to move air out of our family room which has a pellet stove running in it. The room gets so hot we need to move the air out of the room and out to other areas of our house. They work well!! And by the way this is my FIRST review I have ever done after by hundreds of items off Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needed A New Fan
customer_reviews.text: My little fan that I used in my reading room started making noises and just became too loud. I bought this fan because reviews said it was a quiet fan. It is very quiet. I put it on medium and turn it straight up. It circulates the air from the air conditioner and keep the room temperature pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: J.P

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for bedroom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan to use in my bedroom to help cool the room for me to sleep at night. I keep it on a bench at the end of my bed and it keeps me cool all night. The cord is long enough to reach from the outlets in my room. It easily tilts to change direction to get the perfect angle. It is quiet, but provides some light noise which is perfect as a white noise machine. Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Rabeler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid, I feel I more than I expected. There are eight speeds total: 4 on the oscillating side and 4 on the straight air side. The base has extra weight so there is no various movement no matter what speed you're using. The fan is very quiet. All in all, I wish I would have purchased this product years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Mister BB

customer_reviews.title: Underpowered
customer_reviews.text: Tis fan could potentually be way better if it had a more powerful motor & higher speed, because the blades are able to push the air better because of the design. I'm glad I got a used price, because new, it is overpriced for its performance. Other than that it seems to be good quality built.
customer_reviews.author: Paul P.

customer_reviews.title: happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is the best personal fan purchase I've ever made. I ordered a larger one similar and was not happy - different brand. This fan is perfect. I can sit it on the night stand and get the air I need to sleep and help with night sweats without bothering my husband and without drowning out the TV. Its exactly what I needed, fast, quiet and good value.
customer_reviews.author: glmwkansas

customer_reviews.title: Great stream of air and not too loud
customer_reviews.text: For the price I wasnt sure how good a fan this would be. I bought two and they run all night long every night. Couldn't be happier with them (except if they were oscillating) - Relatively quiet, great stream of air on 1, 2 and 3. 3 is turbo and cools the room down quickly, then put on setting 2 because it's quieter at night when sleeping. Thicker solid feeling plastic and knob is in front, so makes it very easy to change the setting, even if it's in dark and half-awake/asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Lillio Kalani

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this HD18NU because I had previously purchased the M15 and was amazed how much air that little thing blew . Now for this HD18NU I was a little disappointed , I dont know why but the air feels cool and constant but not fast like a little breeze across the room it is also a very very quiet fan . It's okay I'm keeping it but wish I had bought the M18 INSTEAD .
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great quiet little fan
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my work area, since sometimes those hot flashes hit suddenly, lol! It's very quiet, and strong if you need it. I usually just put it on the first speed, and I'm cooled off quickly. Last fan I had by my desk was kind of loud, so I love how quiet this is. The only thing it doesn't have is the ability to oscillate left and right, which I miss a little. But it does have an up and down tilt, and it works fine for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris in Denver

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WELL
customer_reviews.text: THIS FAN WORKS WELL TO COOL OUR BEDROOM. I HAVE BEEN RUNNING IT ALL DAY AND NIGHT FOR TWO DAYS SINCE WE HAVE BEEN HAVING 90 DEGREE DAYS. MY ONLY COMPLAINT IS THE PLACEMENT OF THE ON OFF ADJUSTMENT BUTTON. IT IS RIGHT BELOW THE CIRCULAR FAN UNIT ON THE FRAME AND KIND OF AWKWARD TO GET TO. OTHER WISE GREAT FAN FOR COOLING MEDIUM SIZED ROOM.
customer_reviews.author: grandmasandy

customer_reviews.title: Love this Little Fan!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan for my office. I was looking for this kind of design as the one I was replacing was the normal design that was top heavy and fell over all the time. This fan is great! Very steady, no falling over. It's so very quiet! I hardly know it's on and am afraid I'm going to forget to turn it off at night. It really moves the air around also. I love that the dial is on the front too. I was always knocking off the old one when I was trying to turn it off/on. This fan is an all around great value for the price. I am very pleased and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Flower Lady

customer_reviews.title: Effective fan
customer_reviews.text: Good quiet fan. I use it at the office in my cubicle. Easy to unpack and set up. It has 3 speeds. Speeds 2 and 3 produce some wishing noise but speed 1 is very quiet and effective for my 6x6 space. Adjusts upwards or downwards and doesn’t swivel.
customer_reviews.author: MPG_01

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews so many said it made enough sound for sleeping. I just received it and am so disappointed. This fan is very quiet 😏. Air flow is ok for personal space.
customer_reviews.author: IQUILT2

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Bought it fir our son's room, its extremely quiet and you can feel a small breeze in the room even on the low setting. It oscilates, too, which is a plus. Very pleased with it... Might buy another one for our room.
customer_reviews.author: bwl

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, but not the best air flow
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new fan. I have been really happy with the Vornado brand, but it's a little price. I thought this might be a better value. While the WooZoo is about 1/2 the price of the Vornado and oscillates, it also moves about 1/2 as much air. So, if you don't need super strong fan, the WooZoo is a fine fan. I you do (occasionally) appreciate a stronger fan to dry carpet or a wet basement, pony up for the comparable sized Vornado.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Adequate but loud
customer_reviews.text: This is an adequate fan, but doesn't quite circulate an entire room. This does not oscillate and its only movement adjustment is up and down. It is too loud so cannot be used in my office as I work from home. It really didn't fit my needs but is still useable in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet fan.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best fan I’ve ever owned. It is so quiet that I often forget to turn it off. I use a fan all night while sleeping, and it doesn’t interfere with my sleep. It is easy to manipulate into the wanted position and continues to stay there until it is moved. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcella Simon

customer_reviews.title: A whole room circulator it is not.
customer_reviews.text: Output is no different than the Honewell fans that I own that are half the price. Just because you put "circulator" in your title doesn't make you a Vornado. Not even close. It's just a desktop fan. Don't fall for the description.
customer_reviews.author: SquirrelPlease

customer_reviews.title: Great Air Mover and Sleep Machine
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this as a white noise machine for sleep and it is perfect. Just enough noise on the mid level to mask other sounds. This is a great air mover too. Good quality and priced right.
customer_reviews.author: D. W.

customer_reviews.title: Best fan
customer_reviews.text: Its compact, almost no noise and very cool..one of my best summer investment. I chose this one based on other people's reviews and it was true. This is a very well made fan.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Fan
customer_reviews.text: I love this little fan. I need white noise and a soft breeze to sleep. This is perfect. It loves easily, also, such as carrying on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This fan is perfect for me. In the cold months I face it down and turn it in low for white noise. Now that it’s getting warmer I have it on my bureau on high (about 3’ away) facing me and the air is strong enough that it hits my whole body and keeps me cool. It’s an excellent fan for the price. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This little fan does its job and works as expected, especially for this price. It has three settings - low, medium, and high. It's small in size and portable so I can carry it with me from one room to another. It's quiet enough to enjoy watching a movie without any disturbance. I think the manufacturer can improve speed and will be helpful if they can provide more color choices.
customer_reviews.author: Tany

customer_reviews.title: Weak wind power
customer_reviews.text: There is no way this fan can move the air as described in the description. It’s quiet and works like a regular fan, just softer. Does not circulate air in the room.
customer_reviews.author: So Happy

customer_reviews.title: Very useful product
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this fan all summer. Small quiet movement of air is what I wanted and got. Although room is air conditioned the slight breeze make it very comfortable in my open kitchen, dining room, and living room area. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Bob R.

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan
customer_reviews.text: We just ordered this fan, and it has been great. It's small, but produces a good amount of air. We like the way it can be rotated to blow air in different directions for different needs. It's very quiet, even on the high setting. It works well in compliment with other fans to help with circulation.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and efficient
customer_reviews.text: This fan is terrific. I wanted something for air at night that was quiet and this has been great. There is just a little hum that I find after a few minutes I don't even heart. In fact, I have to be sure and remember to turn it off when I get up. Sends out a nice stream of air too. This summer has been hotter than usual here, and this has helped tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Toombstone

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Controls
customer_reviews.text: Product was broken when it arrived despite no damage to the packaging. The fan guard was not installed correctly exposing internals. Don’t see how this was packaged without the defect noticed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: PACKS A POWERFUL PUNCH
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this fan! I will not own any other brand except Woozoo when it comes to fans after purchasing this fan. This is a small and extremely powerful little fan, and it’s not noisy like my Honeywell fan. It’s lightweight and I carry it from room to room with me. Woozoo obviously knows what they are doing when it comes to manufacturing fans; the design is fabulous. This fan puts every other fan out there to shame!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good quality goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: I love the fan size the quality and the mini speech handles it has I plan on ordering more in the near future please keep this product on it really helps out in homes that require the need for space thank you for your services
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Parker

customer_reviews.title: Own two!
customer_reviews.text: These are great little fans. I move them around my house all day and rarely use my A/C. They are attractive and small yet really pump out the air. Would buy again and again, have had no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Great fan!
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations! I bought this to use on milkweed seedlings. It works perfectly, is very sturdy and quiet. It’s a bit pricey, but you are getting a good quality fan. It’s kept my seedlings from getting leggy during the growing process.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Carraway

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little fan
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased my second Woozoo fan. They are incredible in moving air and really do keep a room cool. I have been able to turn off my air conditioner and just use these fans to keep cool. I like how you can twist, turn and maneuver these fans and they are so quiet.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Boland

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for a basic fan
customer_reviews.text: Nice profile and size. Easy to adjust the tilt. Quiet. From an aesthetic perspective, i wish the fan body was matte finish rather than shiny. I would recommend this fan.
customer_reviews.author: Kona

customer_reviews.title: "You get what you pay for"....
customer_reviews.text: Unsatisfied, Returned due to low level CFM/speed output levels. Quick delivery. No problems with packaging n shipping. Good value. Low level noise a Plus. Works as advertised. Recommendations to others 50/50...
customer_reviews.author: j0e

customer_reviews.title: Not the worst - not the best
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, not too noisy does oscillate. Just not powerful enough. This would work great for a small room or office, for a larger one, you would need a larger or more powerful fan.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Relief thy name is WOOZOO
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this fan. True to its reviews, its very quiet. I bought it for a bathroom that has a solar tube which in the summer can be quite warm. And what a relief! And you can make it oscillate facing up so it doesn’t keep on hitting your face.
customer_reviews.author: Marie A.

customer_reviews.title: Mighty wind from a little fan, we love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best fan it is small but it has a strong kick to it. It rotates around and oscillates if you would like it to. Don’t be fooled by the size this fan keeps my large living room cool.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa Bahner

customer_reviews.title: Great compact fan!
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan. Even on high it remains relatively quiet. Pushes out a surprisingly strong breeze on all settings. Appears to be well constructed with heft but not too weighty. I recommend this fan.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Frierson

customer_reviews.title: It's made in China. It won't age gracefully.
customer_reviews.text: It's Chinese so it will not last long. I have it on the floor under the house thermostat, aimed at the ceiling. It lessens the fluctuations inherent with thermostats in dead air. Been running 24/7 since it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Best fan !!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several fans recently and this is buy far the best its so good i bought another one. Its quiet and works well for a small to medium room.
customer_reviews.author: t.b.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, the fan is quiet PROVIDED it is in ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, the fan is quiet PROVIDED it is in static(non-oscillating )position and set at low speed which is adequate for my small apt.I have not tried it at full speed yet but I think it would work quite well. My main beef with this is the control, I have arthritis and accessing the dial, located directly under the fan, is a pain in the ass. On the whole, considering all the cheap crap out there, it is worth the $42. Glenn
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I got this shipped from the states to France from my dad, while I’m aboard and I go to turn it on and it turns on for like 5 seconds and automatically turns off, not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.author: Quien Eres?

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fan for a bedroom/office area.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan for my 5 yr old room. He is kind of sensitive to noise. This fan is SO quiet compared to other fans I've had in the past. #1 is a very light hum you can't hear it at all when a tv is on. #2 and #3 are just a bit more of a hum but he is able to sleep through the hum of #3. I highly recommend this if your looking for quiet fan that is priced fairly.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Holland

customer_reviews.title: We have an addition that does not cool because of all the windows
customer_reviews.text: We had an estimate for a/c ducts that was in the thousands, this fan does the job without the extreme cost and construction. We have an addition that does not cool because of all the windows. We use this fan and it pulls the a/c from the other room into this room. Now the sunroom is comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: AnnT

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet
customer_reviews.text: Love how quiet it is..always forgetting to turn it off because its quiet..using it in a 15 x 12 office..even on low does a good job of stirring the air..little pricey for a small fan but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle LS

customer_reviews.title: Small, blows great air volume
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan! It blows a lot of air at the low speed. It's quiet enough, I don't expect silent when pushing air. I'd buy several more when needed.
customer_reviews.author: dong

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan
customer_reviews.text: What a great, little fan. You would think for the price it wouldn’t be so good, but this fan delivers quite a punch and has 6 settling. Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: G. Saks

customer_reviews.title: Great cooling fan.
customer_reviews.text: Was a great purchase for my kids room. A small unit with a powerful punch. Once turned on, it cools down their room a great deal. It moves very smooth, light weight and not that loud. Was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: AchilleS

customer_reviews.title: bigger and more powerful than expected.  Just as tall as my big Woozoo.  Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny especially next to a hot computer. I also use just this fan in my loom room in 100 degree days, and don't notice it has no other cooling.
customer_reviews.author: Phreadde Davis

customer_reviews.title: perfect for bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Love the way you can aim the fan straight up to the ceiling and get really good circulation. Can't do that with a lot of small fans. Good product. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: C J. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little fan! Pretty powerful for a small fan. Easy to take with you and fits anywhere. I always have a fan close by and this is my favorite
customer_reviews.author: Wedoidos

customer_reviews.title: Not Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: These are cute but the motor wears down really fast. My fan blade began to click on the first level after a week. After a few weeks of use, The second level sounds loud and uneven. I bought two of them and they’re both experiencing similar problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, stable, good circulation, quiet. Does exactly what it says it does. Excellent for dry aging meat in the fridge (with the cord going thru the door seal).
customer_reviews.author: Kaia David

customer_reviews.title: Love this fan!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a fan for my bedroom, and this is perfect. I normally don't like any noise when going to sleep but this is a very low sound that is like white noise. The fan settings are great. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: The rotation on this fan is hard to control, other than that a very good fan to keep you cool.
customer_reviews.text: It finally arrived I thought It would never arrived, this fan is much larger than I expected. This fan kept me cool on hot days.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nursery fan!
customer_reviews.text: We can’t put a ceiling fan in my daughter’s nursery so we needed an alternative. This has been PERFECT! We point it more at the ceiling on the other side of the room and oscillate it and it moves the air around in the room really well. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

product_meta.title: Woozoo Whole Room Circulator Fan, Blade 7", White PCF-HD18NU
product_meta.description: Style Name:Non-Oscillating| Color:White| Size:Fan Blade 7"Perfect for the office, home or dorm, the Woozoo fan offers all the breeze you need in a powerful yet compact unit. The adjustable fan head pivots vertically up to 90 degrees, with three speeds that put you in control so you can direct airflow exactly where and how you want it. Enjoy extra-quiet cooling on the virtually silent ‘low’ setting. Provides up to 275 ft² area coverage, and the 72 inch cord makes it easy to reach the outlet.
feature_bullets: Compact yet powerful fan offers plenty of cooling power while saving space
Six vertical settings let you direct airflow anywhere you want it
Low speed is silent for peaceful/non-interruptive use
Three speed settings to meet your cooling needs, with up to 275 ft² area coverage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,536 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Woozoo HD18NU Whole Room Circulator Fan, White
